trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class is an optional event that is raised only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A> property is explicitly set to a type other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>类是一个可选的事件，才会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A>属性显式设置为类型以外`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> event is implemented to perform mask-specific and type-specific validation processing.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>事件实现来执行掩码特定和特定类型的验证处理。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, general validation is typically performed in the standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> base class.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，在标准<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>基的类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>中定义的事件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>通常执行常规的验证
